game.name: Crazy Dude
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
